name: FIND ALL 4: Magic
description:
Find All Magic is a hidden object game. Plunge into a fascinating magical world and find hidden cute cats, dogs, birds and many other different objects. Finding the lost objects the black and white world is colored and comes alive. You decide which items you want to find. The game also features additional puzzles. This game is suitable for all ages.
Game Features:
- Over 800 different search items
- There are hints
- Puzzles
- option to choose the desired item to search for
- levels are coloring
- 2.5D effect
